page.title: 08THE SWAFFHAMS CRICKET CLUB
page.content: The Swaffhams Cricket Club was formed two years ago when the Swaffham Bulbeck club joined with the Swaffham Prior club.They joined forces because both teams were finding it hard to find enough players. Home matches are played on the lovely Swaffham Bulbeck recreation ground,the Denny,where the team has the use of the pavilion. Games are played in midweek and at the weekends.Nearly all the players come from one or other of the two villages. Every year the club puts on a very popular six-a-side tournament.
